item.title: BUDS: Snowsports without snow
item.author: Gerald Hawkins,
item.description: Life is a relentless cycle of untold misery; the daily drudgery of existence a crushing weight on the unfortunate shoulders of the conscious and the sober. An all-too-brief respite from this grim reality was granted to the dedicated few who chose to brave the annual pilgrimage to Edinburgh for the …

item.title: Snowsports trip to Tignes
item.author: Gerald Hawkins,
item.description: Give me your clothes, your boots, and your dignity – a common cry across the land as 40 eager Imperialites joined hundreds of students from around the country in preparation for the British Universities Snowsports Council (BUSC) Main event 2011. The stench of sweaty ski/board boots filled the air as …
